runs.comm: tries to flick it off his body and hits the thigh pad
blocked to mid-off
turned away through square leg to get off the mark
goes for the cut shot but miss timed and the ball hits the bottom edge in to the ground
bit of a wider delivery and McCullum get's in position early for the cut, smashing the ball between cover and extra cover
good footwork again and this time he places the ball past mid-off for four more
blocked to mid-off
full delivery but too much width and Ryder flashes hard at the cut shot. Doesn't catch the middle of the bat but flies over backward point
edged between slips and gully to third man
going down leg-side
he shuffles across his stumps and takes a step down the track only for hit to hit him on the toe by a fuller ball down the leg-side
dropped in to the gap at fine leg
angled away to point
full toss driven to mid-on
fuller length again worked away in to the covers
flicked away off his hips backward of square leg but picked up on the boundary
blocked in to the ground
goes for the big shot and it doesn't come off. The ball dribbles away to Gayle at midwicket
Ryder snaps his wrists round to whip the ball away past short leg and to the rope for four
hit high over square leg and a howler of a misfield on the bounce at the boundary gifts McCullum four
turned away fine off his toes towards fine leg and four more
shorter ball and McCullum goes at it baseball style only getting the ball to mid-on
fuller ball dug away off his feet to midwicket
too short and Ryder picks it up early leaning back and dispatching the ball high over square leg and in to the crowd. Right off the middle of the bat
good reply. Slower ball fools Ryder
helped down to the gap at long-on

dropped catch, Ryder tries to lift the ball over the infield but doesn't catch it right and it floats past Pollard mid-off who seems to have it in both hands as he jumps to his right but he can only palm it away. Bad drop
McCullum gets underneath it and lifts it high over the bowlers head and all the way for six
defended to mid-off
full toss pulled away through square leg and the ball bounces just before the rope
fed in to the gap at midwicket and they jog a single
fuller delivery batted away to midwicket
good cut shot but an equally good stop at cover
full again and placed off his toes to midwicket
full toss and too full this time as McCullum turns it away fine on the leg side and it races away for four
prodded away to point and they take one
drove to the man at deep mid-off
goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect
good flight and fuller ball hit back to long-off
pulled through square leg and fielded on the boundary
full toss driven back to the bowler
pitched up and blocked back to Benn
good areas again as he flights the ball right on the toes of McCullum and all he can do is jab it straight back
too wide and Ryder chases it. He connects hitting it straight back over the bowlers head and just makes it over the rope for a maximum boundary
bowled on his legs and blocked straight
lifted over the fielder at midwicket and the ball runs away for four more
fuller ball prodded off his feet to midwicket
he takes a step or two down the track to take the ball on the full lifting it high over square leg and it just clears the boundary
too far outside off-stump
short of a length and McCullum rocks back and pulls the ball high over backward square leg and in to the crowd
bounces off his toe and lazy fielding at short leg allows them to sneak a second leg bye with his back turned
great shot. Ryder gets down low and flicks to ball past the keeper and down fine leg for four more
driven straight to the man at mid-off
picks the gap in the covers perfectly and well-timed enough to reach the boundary
driven away and picked up by cover
full toss which Ryder sweeps away down fine to the leg-side
played down to long-on
too much width and he cuts it away in the air through the covers

dropped catch, goes for six but doesn't get all of it. Going high over the bowlers head and Findlay from long-on makes good ground to get across but they makes a hash of the diving catch attempt pushing the ball away from him
pre-meditated reverse sweep doesn't come off as the ball travels down the leg-side
an easy single to the two men down at long-off and long-on
they jog a single to long-off and that's 50 for Jesse Ryder
slower ball outside off-stump and Ryder pulls out of the shot at the last moment
going down leg-side and the keeper just misses it!
Ryder's found the pace and length and he leans back pulling the ball over square midwicket and it clatters off a burger van about 30 feet over the rope
shorter ball which is going well above Ryder's head but he takes a tennis serve style motion towards the ball and gets nothing on it. The ball carries over the flailing keeper for four more
played down to long-on
turned away to the man at deep midwicket
too short from Gayle and he lifts it high over midwicket and several rows back in the crowd
down to long-on
in to the gap at midwicket
goes to cut the ball and it's in the air for a moment. Looks like it's dipping short of Chanderpaul at extra cover but he gets his hands underneath it to take a great catch
he drops it to midwicket and takes a quick single
cut away but fielded at point
erratic bowling well wide of off-stump
cut away and a great diving catch attempt at backward point but it runs away for four
indisciplined bowling outside off-stump
slower ball and a thick edge down to third man
straight drive picked up at long-off

Taylor takes a step down the track and makes good contact to lift the ball flat through square leg and it looks like six all the way but Xavier Marshall pulls off an absolute blinder of a catch right on the rope to the amazement of the crowd and Ross Taylor. Stunning!
turned away behind square leg and they take a couple
dropped in to fine leg
Gayle pitches it up tempting Ryder and he takes the bait clubbing the ball across the line straight down the throat of Sarwan at long-off
turned through square leg and they want two but Flynn slips while turning at the non-strikers end
flicked to midwicket and they get two without problem this time
chipped to the covers
pitched up from Gayle and a leading edge back to the bowler
batted down to long-on
a single down to deep midwicket
straight drive through the legs of the bowler but picked up at long-off
angled away to gully
flicked to square leg for one
too far down the leg-side and a good save from the keeper
chipped away down to long-on
slower ball pitched up and Flynn goes for it. Ramdin makes good ground running behind himself and the ball is spinning in the air for a long time before he makes a decent catch
Franklin probes at the block and the spin deceives both him and Ramdin running away for four
turned down to fine leg
simple runs to the man at long-off
take a quick single to short third man
dropped to square leg and they sprint through
blocked back to the bowler
good drive but blocked at extra cover

dropped down to midwicket and the lack of pace on the ball allows them to turn back for two. Looks like it's safe but a good pick up and throw makes things interesting. Oram looks home but the decision is sent to the third umpire and Oram is out by the smallest of margins
blocked away to the covers
blocked away to point and they sprint a single
fended off to point
drove away to long-off
bowled up in to the body and Vettori gets caught for room and tries to lean the ball away to third man but can only play the ball on to his stumps
straight drive picked up at long-off
blocked to cover
hit down the ground to long-on
fuller ball dug away to the leg-side
smashes off the foot and towards point and they take one
driven in to the covers
in the slot and he manages to get right under it lifting the ball over midwicket and in to the crowd
thundering straight drive along the ground which splits long-off and long-on
half volley again and hit straight and hard back over the bowlers head and  all the way for six!
pitched up and he goes for more heroics but he can only help the ball to the man at long-off who takes a simple catch
hacked away to point and they scramble one
straight drive picked up at long-off and smart running for the second and Benn takes a wild shy at the stumps gifting New Zealand an overthrow
angled to point and a single to get off the mark
yorker which Mills doesn't connect with and it removes his off-stump
fuller ball which he takes a swing and a miss
fuller ball dug out down the track and they scamper one quickly before taking another overthrow courtesy of Taylor
last ball pitched up and through to the keeper. The ball is throw from the keeper to the bowler who whips off the bails taking Southee's wicket by couple of feet.
